name: Blueberry Mojito
preparation:
Nothing against the classic Mojito, but using premium cognac and adding blueberries to the mix leads to an even more refreshing cocktail.

Add all ingredients except soda water into a shaker with ice and shake until blueberries are bruised.

Strain into a Collins glass over fresh ice.

Top with soda water.

Garnish with a mint sprig and blueberries.
